newsitem.title: CHINA: Hainan Pearl seen moving to black in H1.
newsitem.headline: Hainan Pearl seen moving to black in H1.

text.p: China's Hainan Pearl River Enterprises Co Ltd is likely to post a profit for the first half of this year after a huge loss in 1996, a company spokesman said on Wednesday.
An upturn in the property markets in Shanghai and the southern island province of Hainan brought in the profits, he told the Hong Kong-based newsletter China Securities Bulletin.
The official declined to give details.
The company reported a net loss of 186.5 million yuan for full 1996 based on Chinese accounting standards. No figures based on international standards were available.
